sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './description-generator.css' const DescriptionGenerator = () => { const [brandName, setBrandName] = useState("") const [brandInfo, setBrandInfo] = useState([]) const[priceInfo, setPriceInfo] = useState(); useEffect(()=>{ console.log("useEffect called."); axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/admin/video-description/brand-info/"+brandName).then((res)=>{ console.log(res.data); setBrandInfo(res.data) }) },[brandName]) return (
Description Generator
{brandName}
Brand Url : {brandInfo[1]}
Discount percent : {brandInfo[2]}

tags: {brandInfo[3]}

) } export default DescriptionGenerator
